Fuck off Namorax, you douche.  The budget for the original Paranormal activity was 15,000...fifteen thousand! and it grossed almost 200 million.  The only reasons that a films' budget is high, is if there are the typical A-list assholes in it and they need their 10-20 million a movie, all the special effects, whose companies charge exorbitant rates averaging out to around 2 grand or more per hour.  Take Avatar for example.  Like 10 percent of that movie was real...maybe less, and the budget was like 250,000,000.

Actually a better example of a low budget quality film is El Mariachi, Robert Rodriguez first film. Thats a masterpiece that he originally shot for $7000, and then the studios polished up with another 200k or so. But for 200k he launched a franchise, and a major career, and is pioneering the Digital and 3D technology in film today.
